About

Mission

Led by the Holy Spirit, to gather and worship the triune God. To grow in faith and obedience to God's Word. To go and proclaim the Gospel to the world. For the glory of our heavenly Father.

Pastoral Staff

Pastor Jimmy Hao

Pastor Wendy Cheung
